extension.description: WatchNixtoons2 is an Anime Add-on that gets frequent updates, but available in multiple repos so having it's own main repo makes maintaining updates much easier. The repo is by G-man but the add-on is maintained by lolage on reddit: http://bit.ly/3Oq0EEU

Watch cartoons and anime from [COLOR orange][B]www.wcofun.net[/B][/COLOR].
Support the WatchCartoonOnline website with a PayPal donation to: [COLOR khaki][B]wcohelp@yandex.com[/B][/COLOR]
Add-on originally by doko. Random updates by lolage.
extension.disclaimer: The authors of this addon do not host any of the content found or have any affiliation with the content providers. This add-on only scrapes web pages.
